You are not able to add profile as you permanently denied permission, please enable from app settings.
Allow App all the required permissions to send auto SMS.
Are you sure want to delete this profile?
No application available to send email

This is incoming call ring duration. If a missed call is greater than this duration (in seconds) then SMS will be sent automatically. Generally, the ring time can be set in increments of 15 seconds to a maximum of 30 seconds.
Auto SMS sent via WillCallU App
Missing calls often of your loved-ones?\nLet them know on missing their call via sending an SMS prewritten by you automatically on a missed call. Know more %s

Have you ever been in a situation when someone called you and you were busy that you missed their call, but at the same time you want to let them know that "I am busy somewhere."


Here WillCallU will help you. How?


If someone calls you and you missed their call, then WillCallU will send prewritten SMS like "I am in the office and my phone is on silent mode" or "I am in a gym, will call you once I see your miss call" automatically to the caller.


You can set predefined profiles using a combination of days and hours. Based on that an SMS will fire automatically on a missed call.
Once you create a profile, you\'ll see it listed here. Click on a \"+\" sign to create Profile.

1. Open Settings.
2. Open Permissions.
3. Open Auto Start.
4. Scroll to WillCallU App and Enable it.
1. Open Security Center.\n2. Open Startup Manager.\n3. Scroll to WillCallU App and Enable it.
